    • Calculations and Definitions

    Calculations and DefinitionsÂ¶

    Below is a list of the metrics used in reporting and how they are defined. How these metrics are calculated in the routine will also be displayed.

    Metric Definition Example
    Postpaid Plans Count of Plans associated with a Device A Postpaid Plan must have a device and a plan Device1 – Plan1 = 1 Postpaid Plan Device2 – Plan2 = 1 Postpaid Plan Device3 – = 0 Postpaid Plans Total: 2 Postpaid Plans
    Prepaid Plans Count of Devices without a Plan or String  
    Services Count of service strings in Device (string) column ServiceString1, ServiceString2 = 2 Services ServiceString3 = 1 Service Total: 3 Services
